mapper.select: SELECT CART_NO, ITEM_NO, CART_COUNT, (CAR_NAME) ITEM_NAME, (CAR_RENT_PRICE)PRICE FROM "CART" JOIN "ITEM" USING (ITEM_NO) JOIN "CAR" USING (ITEM_NO) WHERE SALE_TYPE = 1 AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CATEGORY_CODE = 1
